amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that tribal treaty rights would be preserved and that tribes would be consulted.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 112-660 to ensure tribal treaty rights are preserved and tribes are consulted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 213 (Roll no. 563).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 213 (Roll no. 563).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. McCollum.
